Name: Summer Flame Aesi

Actions.Name: Brew Smash
Effects: All affected foes take +1 intoxication if they have less than 4.
On hit: Critical hit against dazed foes.

Actions.Name: Wandering Haze
Actions.Description: The Aesi dashes 2, then shoves an adjacent foe 1.

Actions.Name: Raucous Dance
Actions.Description: The Aesi implores all foes in the area to dance, shoving them 2 spaces. Characters can choose the direction by taking +1 intoxication, otherwise the Aesi chooses the direction.

Actions.Name: Uncork
Actions.Description: The Aesi summons a size 1 keg object in range 3. The object has aura 1. Characters in the aura are dazed+, and if they start their turn there, they increase their intoxication by +1.

Actions.Name: Fire Pit
Actions.Description: The Aesi creates a pit space that is also dangerous terrain.

Actions.Name: Stiff Drink
Actions.Description: The Aesi implores an adjacent character to drink before giving them a stiff whack. If the character drinks, they gain vigor 1 but increase their intoxication by 2. Then, they must save or take 2[D]+[fray] damage from the Aesi and become dazed, or [D]+[fray] on a successful save. Dazed foes fail the save.

PhasesDescription: The Aesi enters Phase II when bloodied.

Actions.Name: Ignite
Actions.Description: The Aesi shows off its fire breathing. A foe in range 4 must save or take 3 damage, once, (reduced to 1, once, on a successful save) for every stack of intoxication they have, but then clears all intoxication, resetting the die to 1.

Actions.Name: Duel of Flagons
Actions.Description: The Aesi chooses a foe in range 3 and tosses them a flagon.

ListedItems.Description: If that character chooses not to drink, the Aesi gains vigor 1 and clears all statuses and marks.

If that character chooses to drink, they increase their intoxication by 2. The foe rolls 1d6 and the Aesi rolls 1d8. The loser of the contest becomes dazed and takes 2 divine damage, or 4 if they were already dazed. If a character wins, they can challenge the Aesi again, repeating this effect.
